mapper.insert: insert into mentor(mentor_seq, mentor_company, mentor_department, mentor_position, job_code, mentor_school, mentor_career, mentoring_code, mentor_represent, mentor_info, mentor_etc, mentor_email, mentor_selectNaming, mentor_businesscard, mentor_logtime) values(mentor_seq.nextval, #{mentor_company}, #{mentor_department}, #{mentor_position}, #{job_code}, #{mentor_school}, #{mentor_career}, #{mentoring_code}, #{mentor_represent}, #{mentor_info}, #{mentor_etc}, #{mentor_email}, #{mentor_selectNaming}, #{mentor_businesscard}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from mentor where mentor_email = #{member_email}

select * from(select rownum rn, tt.* from (select mt.* , mb.member_name , mb.member_seq , mb.member_profile , j.job_type from mentor mt, job j, mentors_member mb where mt.mentor_email = mb.member_email and j.job_code = mt.job_code and mentor_flag = #{mentor_flag} order by mt.mentor_seq desc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select count(*) from mentor where mentor_flag = #{mentor_flag}

mapper.select: select e.essayboard_title, e.essayboard_content, e.essayboard_scrap, e.essayboard_logtime, e.essayboard_seq, mm.member_seq from essayboard e, mentor mt, mentors_member mm where e.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email and mm.member_email = e.mentor_email and mm.member_seq = ${mentor_seq} order by essayboard_logtime desc

select rv.review_seq, rv.review_content, rv.review_date, mm1.member_name as mentor_name, mm2.member_name as mentee_name, mm2.member_profile, rv.mentee_email, rv.review_flag from meeting_review rv, mentors_member mm1, mentors_member mm2, meetingboard m where rv.meetingboard_seq = m.meetingboard_seq and rv.mentee_email = mm2.member_email and mm1.member_email = m.mentor_email and mm1.member_seq = ${mentor_seq} order by rv.review_date desc
